rationale: This trade massively upgrades Team A's starting lineup projection by over 10 points weekly. It acquires an elite QB1 in Jalen Hurts (+5.3 proj. over McCarthy) and a top-tier RB2 in Josh Jacobs (+5.1 proj. over Pollard). We consolidate our quality depth at TE (Njoku) and WR (Mims Jr.) to acquire dominant starters at key positions, significantly increasing our championship equity.
